title: Kyokutou no Hanamuko
sinopse: Prince Asura bought Kichiya from the prostitution house after seeing his bromide. Even though they have a language barrier, Kichiya is getting attracted by Asura’s warmth and love. Is Asura taking Kichiya as a plaything or truly in love with him? Includes 4 one-shot with a prisoner and a warden, yakuza and cosplay game. (Source: Attractive Fascinante)
